trans-unit.source: Provides static methods and properties for <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于静态方法和属性<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: All methods of this class are called by passing in a reference to the object that is requesting access to the method.
trans-unit.target: 此类的所有方法所都调用的传入到正在请求对方法的访问的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the built-in object model category.
trans-unit.target: 此类所属的内置对象模型类别。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a prototype-based object that is using this prototype.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于原型的对象，该对象正在使用此原型的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a prototype-based object.
trans-unit.target: 对基于原型的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref> that uses scientific (E) notation.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式指定<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref>使用科学 (E) 表示法。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
A number between 0 and 20 that represents the number of decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 20 之间的数字，表示要显示的小数位数的数字。

trans-unit.source: The default is 16.
A string representation of thisob.
Creates a string representation of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref> that displays the specified number of decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式指定<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref>显示指定的数目的十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
A number between 0 and 20 that represents the number of decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 20 之间的数字，表示要显示的小数位数的数字。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
A string representation of thisob.
Creates a string representation of the specified object that is based on <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo*> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo*>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo></xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo*>为基础的指定对象

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
A string representation of thisob.
Creates a string representation of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref> that displays the specified number of precision digits.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式指定<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref>显示指定的位数的精度数字。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
A number between 0 and 21 that represents the number of precision digits to display.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 21 之间的数字，表示要显示的精度数字的数字。

trans-unit.source: `Precision digits` are the digits of the decimal and the exponent combined.
trans-unit.target: `Precision digits`小数点的数字和指数组合。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of thisob.
Creates a string representation of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this method is acting upon.
A number between 2 and 36 that represents the base of the number system that `thisob` is expressed in.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于之间的数字 2 和 36 表示的数字系统的基数，`thisob`用表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
A string representation of thisob.
Returns the value of the specified <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.NumberObject"></xref>.
The object that this method is acting upon.
The value of thisob.
